meanings.definition: A thick, smooth drink of fresh fruit pureed with milk, yogurt, or ice cream.
meanings.sent1: I love to make delicious smoothies with bananas and strawberries.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I enjoy a refreshing smoothie for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The tropical smoothie danced on my taste buds with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as a perfectly blended smoothie.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the smoothie made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at smoothing things over.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real smoothie when it comes to resolving conflicts.
meanings.sent2: The diplomat was known for being a smoothie in negotiations.
meanings.sent3: The smoothie at the office always knows how to calm everyone down.
meanings.sent4: She was a smoothie in the way she handled the tense situation.
meanings.sent5: His smoothie skills helped bring peace to the group.
